p: To summarise, data for the exposure and sensitivity indicators are freely available to download at national scales ( Table 2, see methods). Adaptive capacity data for Uganda and Vietnam was attained from government sources ( Table 3), whilst in Nicaragua, as noted, data from a previous study was utilised [ 7]. In regard to selecting datasets to represent the indicators we sought open source data for the most recent year available, at the finest resolution, and covering the full extent of the country. The datasets used are obtained from a variety of sources and are specific to the case study countries ( Table 2).
